section.37: The Book of Clothes and Adornment

hadiths.text: Ibn Abbas reported that Allah's Messenger (ï·º) saw an ass which had been cauterised on the face. He disapproved of it saying:By Allah, I do not cauterise (the animal) but on a part at a distance from the face, and commanded (for the cauterisation) of his ass and it was cauterised on the buttocks and he was the first to cauterise on the buttocks
